headline: Allstate (ALL) Reports $184M July Catastrophe Losses
summary: The Allstate Corporation (NYSE:ALL) is one of the best very cheap stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On August 21, the company provided the July 2025 monthly release, where it reported catastrophe losses totaling $184 million (pre-tax) or $145 million (after-tax) for the month. The losses resulted from 19 separate wind and hail events […]

headline: Why Is Allstate (ALL) Up 0.3% Since Last Earnings Report?
summary: Allstate (ALL) reported earnings 30 days ago. What's next for the stock? We take a look at earnings estimates for some clues.
